code: import React from'react';import recipes from'../recipes';import Swal from'sweetalert2';const Menu=()=>{const handleOrder=id=>{console.log(id,"id is clicked");Swal.fire({title:"Are You Sure?",text:"You won't be able to revert this!",icon:'warning',showDenyButton:true,confirmButtonText:"Yes, Order it!",denyButtonText:"Cancel"}).then(result=>{if(result.isConfirmed){Swal.fire("Order Placed Successfully!","","success");}else if(result.isDenied){Swal.fire("Order canceled!","","info");}});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"menu-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"menu-header"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",null," This weeks specials!")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"cards"},recipes.map(recipe=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{key:recipe.id,className:"menu-itmes"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:recipe.image,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"menu-content"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"heading "},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h5",null,recipe.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,recipe.price)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,recipe.description),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"orderBtn",onClick:()=>handleOrder(recipe.id)},"Order Now"))))));};export default Menu;
